title: Taxi Services
description: Traditional local taxi companies or ride-sharing apps like Uber and Lyft.

title: House Cleaning Services
description: Regular cleaning, deep cleaning, move-in/move-out cleaning, post-construction cleaning, etc.

title: Handyman Services
description: Local professionals for home repairs, plumbing, electrical work, and general maintenance.

title: Lawn Care & Landscaping
description: Lawn mowing, gardening, landscaping design, seasonal tasks, and pest control for yards.

title: Pest Control
description: Services to handle infestations of insects, rodents, termites, and other pests.

title: Airbnb/Short-Term Rental Cleaning
description: Specialized cleaning for short-term rental properties between guest stays.

title: Home Painting Services
description: Interior and exterior painting for homes, including touch-ups and full re-painting projects.

title: Moving Services
description: Local movers who help with transporting furniture and belongings during a move.

title: Home Security & Alarm Systems
description: Installation and maintenance of home security systems, cameras, and alarms to enhance safety.
